scripts.distribute:electron: npm install && ng build --base-href ./ && electron-packager ./ smartmirror-ui-app --platform=linux --arch=armv7l --overwrite && electron-packager ./ smartmirror-ui-app --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite
scripts.distribute:electron-linux: ng build --base-href ./ && electron-packager ./ smartmirror-ui-app --platform=linux --arch=armv7l --overwrite && rmdir "smartmirror-ui-app-linux-armv7l/resources/app/src" /s /q && rmdir "smartmirror-ui-app-linux-armv7l/resources/app/node_modules" /s /q
scripts.distribute:electron-win64: ng build --base-href ./ && electron-packager ./ smartmirror-ui-app --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite && rmdir "smartmirror-ui-app-win32-x64/resources/app/src" /s /q && rmdir "smartmirror-ui-app-win32-x64/resources/app/node_modules" /s /q
scripts.buildAndDeploy: npm run distribute:electron-linux && npm run transferBuildToPi
